Series.Actors: |Alexis Thorpe|Alison Sweeney|Arianne Zuker|Crystal Chappell|Drake Hogestyn|Eric Winter|Erik Von Detten|John Ingl|Josh Taylor|Kirsten Storms|Kyle Lowder|Matthew Ashford|Melinda Clarke|Michael Easton|Patty Weaver|Peter Reckell|Valerie Wildman|Yvonna Wright|
Series.Overview: "Like sands through the hourglass... so are the Days of Our Lives." These words, spoken by late cast member Macdonald Carey, open every episode of this daytime drama, chronicaling the trials and tribulations of the citizens of the fictional city of Salem.

Episode.Overview: The first ever episode of Days of Our Lives opens with Julie and some of her friends entering Bartlett's department store. They slowly walk to a display case and take a fur out of the case. The shop has been the victim of robberies in the recent weeks and security wasn't taking any chances. As Julie and her friends are about to leave, security stops them... *Hourglass opening* Julie and her friends are in the police station being questioned. However instead of Julie giving her real last name (Olsen) she lies and says that her last name is Horton. Picture fades to a house number plate that reads ""Dr. Thomas Horton."" Inside Alice is looking over picture frames on the mantle, remembering all of her children. Her and Tom discuss that that the house has gotten much quieter since their children have moved out, much to Alice's dismay. Tom reminds her that they have much to look forward to...Marie's wedding to Tony Merritt. Cue for Marie and Tony's entrance along with Mickey. They go over plan
The police release Julie to Tom. Julie feels bad about shoplifting and refuses to see Ben and Addie, so Marie tries to comfort her.
Ben argues with Mickie about how to handle Julie. Addie and Ben pick up Julie from Tom's. Meanwhile, Tony flies to Boston.

Ben and Addie get to see the security tape of Julie's shoplifting incident, and punish Julie thereafter. Julie begs Steve to help her run away, but he is reluctant to do so. Meanwhile, Tony has a dizzy spell.
Tony's dizzy spells continue, as do Ben and Mickey's fights over Julie.
Marie and Addie argue. Jim begins to worry about Tony after he has another dizzy spell. Tom confides in Carl that he has an ulcer.
Tony finally goes to a doctor for his dizzy spells, and the doctor is confused by Tony's blood work. Julie has her first hearing in the shoplifting case.
Tony is informed of his rare blood disease, causing him to reconsider his wedding. Meanwhile, Marie and Alice make wedding plans, unaware of Tony's diagnosis.

Tony gets drunk and refuses to return to Salem, worried about telling his fiancee about his condition. However, he confides in Jim, who promises to keep it a secret. Marie talks about the wedding with Tom and Craig, and Mickey decides that Julie might ought to move out.
Following Mickey's suggestion, Julie moves in with Alice and Tom. Tony comes home from Boston and tells Craig that he can't get married.
Marie has her bridal photos taken Julie receives a mystery phone call Tony and Craig argue about his decision Tom cooks popcorn in the fireplace
Tony tells Marie that he can't marry her Mrs. Sawyer tells Tom that Carl isn't well Marie attempts suicide with pills Mickey and Tom find Marie unconscious
Tom saves Marie's life Alice doesn't give a message to Tom Dr. Fell visits Carl
Tom arrives too late; Carl is dead Jean says Tom murdered Carl Tom wants Marie's suicide attempt to be kept a secret Alice blames herself for Carl's death
Diane and Craig talk about her marriage Mickey and Tom discuss their strategy Tom tries to cheer up Marie Rusty advises Tom to tell the truth

Problems arise between Pete and Melissa when Pete is arrested for possession of stolen property, and Lars tells Melissa that he is in love with her. Patch and Kayla spend the day with Max, the little boy they've been looking after, and finally get him to speak. Alice arranges a meeting bewteen Bo and Hope at Blondies.
Roman and Marlena exchange romantic gifts. The Brady family sings Silent Night. John and Isabella pray together at St. Jude's.
Tension arises between Roman and Marlena over their new agreement. Lawrence opens up to Lisanne about John being his brother. Carly and Bo learn her baby is still alive!
Roman and Marlena witness the tension between Shawn and Caroline. Shane and Kayla grow more distant from each other. Lawrence starts making inroads with Carrie.
Lawrence and Lisanne engage in another night of unbridled sex. Molly and Tanner profess their love for each other. Marlena and Roman share a sensual dinner at Wings.
Kimberly and Philip plan to run off to Las Vegas and get married. Roman and Taylor are hot on the trail of a murderer. Carrie makes a serious anti-drug statement.

Austin manages to win the fight with Carrie's encouragement, and uses the money to bail himself and Billie out of their jams. Roman and Bo arrest Tim and charge him with illegal gambling. A.D.A. Rebecca Morrison reminds John that he owes her dinner.

After listening to Rebecca's expert witness who denies his belief in the existence of multiple personality disorder, Marlena is unable to recover any ground. As Kim's sister-in-law, she is viewed as a biased witness. The judge revokes bail. Carly and Victor talk to John, who tells them that he'd like to donate half of Alamain's profits to Charity in Isabella's name (the Toscano Foundation). Victor doesn't think Lawrence will go for it, but Carly wants them to give him a chance.
Roman and Marlena invite John to join them at the Marx Brothers festival.
Jennifer interviews John and Marlena about her ordeal in the pit, and at Phillip's insistance, brings up the time when Marlena and John thought they were married.
John and Marlena talk on the pier, and finally admit what each has known for some time...the love they shared during the years he thought he was Roman has never died.
While Marlena and Roman try to enjoy a romantic evening at home, someone is lurking outside the house.

Someone watches as Marlena and John make love on the conference table. Carrie is shocked to be a 'Face of the 90s' finalist. Carly prepares to leave the country with Nikki and Lawrence. Jennifer takes the manuscript from Jack and Billie.

Roman offers Tim a way out if he's willing to incriminate Austin. Carrie's bandages come off, but she'll need major reconstructive surgery. Marlena is torn between John and Roman as John moves on with Rebecca. Alice recognizes Kate but can't quite place her.
Carrie offers Roman a deal he can't refuse.

Shawn told Sami that he and the rest of the family were behind her, no matter what. In an aside, Marlena told Sami that John knew that she knew about the affair, and she was going to tell Roman. John balked, as he worried how it would make Roman feel, but Marlena said she couldn't continue to force her own daughter to lie for her, and that this was too hard on her. Roman later thanked John for being such a wonderful friend and talked about his love for Isabella, but all John could feel was guilt that he had betrayed his 'friend' by sleeping with his wife. At the Titan party, Laura entertained fantasies of strangling Kate. Dressed as a man to avoid being recognized, Vivian begged Laura not to do anything yet...she had the perfect revenge in mind, but revenge needs planning. Laura finally relented, and agreed to take the anti-psychotics that Vivian had stolen from Pinehaven. Victor and Kate both spotted Vivian, but although she looked 'familiar', neither saw through the disguise. Stefano

Jennifer was touched when Peter offered the use of his private plane to fly her and Laura back to Chicago. Ivan admits he's been forced to sleep with Ann to keep her from realising where Vivian went. When Austin runs into Brandee, he insists that she come to the pub to explain the truth to Carrie. Doug and Julie reminisced about the old days before heading to Switzerland.

After a quick call from Kate, Ann catches Vivian questioning Laura, and sedates her. John believes he knows something in his past that can hurt Stefano. Tony reluctantly agrees to return to Salem to confront Stefano.

Billie, Jennifer, and Kristen start off having a girl's night which quickly turns into a bonding session as Billie reveals her worry that Bo will walk away from her, Jennifer reveals she is signing the divorce papers, and Kristen tells a story about a woman in love with two men. Sami is weirded out when Stefano 'reads her palm' at the hospital and tells her that she is in love with a man with the initials 'A.R.'. She panics when John and Marlena arrive to do a blood test on Belle.

Jonah, Austin, and Carrie wished Lexie good luck as she prepared to take her entrance exams for medical school. Afterward, Jonah was thrilled when Tom Horton offered him a job as a lab technician. Peter had lunch with Jennifer and Abby, and told Abby that he was crazy about her mother. Lucas assured Victor that there was no way he could be connected to Curtis.

John begs Marlena not to tell Roman about their affair. Partly it's because Sami begged her not to destroy her family, but primarily it's because John needs Roman to catch Stefano. While babysitting little Belle, Austin and Carrie talk about their dreams for the future, and realise they want the same things. Jennifer is amazed that Peter would drop everything to fly her to Chicago.

Desperate to keep Stefano from blurting out the truth about her indiscretion with John, Marlena announced to everyone assembled for Belle's baptism that she had broken her marriage vows. In Pine Haven, Ann finally managed to sedate Vivian and have her taken to a high-security wing. Bo was curious when Carrie told her that Lucas had a picture of Curtis.

Roman has been devastated by the news that Marlena slept with John. His parents comfort him about the affair, and Shawn wonders if it's possible that Belle is John's child. Meanwhile, Carrie tells Marlena that she has destroyed her belief in love. Roman and Lucas investigate Curtis' murder, and learn from Mary that Kate was severely beaten on the night in question.
Roman ordered Marlena to leave the house after she gave him the details of her affair with John.

Thanks to Ivan, Vivian learned that Ann Goldberg was over-medicating patients to scam money out of their families. After ringing Jack's divorce lawyer, Jennifer asked Peter to go skiing. Peter and Stefano moved into the Donovan mansion.

Lucas convinced Alan to go skiing at Green Mountain Lodge after learning that Carrie was going there from Sami, and that she and Austin had broken up. Neither realised that Carrie and Austin had recently made up. Jennifer was furious when she received divorce papers from Jack, and told Alice that their marriage was over. She took off her wedding ring, and prepared to go skiing with Peter. When Kate tried to get rid of the shoes she was wearing the night Curtis died, Mary became suspicious. Bo told Billie that Pat Hamilton wouldn't delay her trial, and the two fell asleep in each other's arms. When the equipment short-circuited, Ann Goldberg asked Nurse Jackson to prepare Vivian for a lobotomy.

In questioning shops looking for Kate's unique shell shoes, Bo learns that they were used in a Bella photo shoot. Roman initially doesn't believe that John is Belle's father, but Sami's anger toward Marlena betrays the truth. While John and Abe wait at Fred Harris' apartment, Fred calls Stefano and Peter and demands more money. Carrie tells the doctor she was not raped in the attack and swears Austin to silence.

Stefano forces a doubting Tony to push the wedding ahead, even though Kristen is having her own doubts as well. Marlena insists that Roman is Belle's father, until Sami confesses to switching the paternity results. Bo searches the mansion for the shoes without success, not realising Kate just threw them out. Fred Harris denies any connection to Stefano.

At the Brady Pub, everyone expresses concern over Carrie being attacked at the ski lodge. When Marlena arrives as per Carrie's invitation, Roman tells her that she is not welcome. John, having learned of the attack from Abe, also shows up, and he and Roman get into it, prompting Carrie to leave. Meanwhile, Alan calls Carrie after hearing of her attack through Lucas, but she's not interested in talking to him. Tony and Kristen are on their honeymoon, having consummated their marriage. Determined to put a fresh face on things, Kristen confesses that she had an affair with John Black, only to realise that Tony didn't hear her. When they return to Salem, they narrowly miss Peter talking to Stefano, who is supposed to be dead. At the trial, Bo tells the judge that he believes Kate Kiriakis is a viable suspect in Curtis' death. When Kate reveals how shocked (and nervous) his words make her, Billie demands to know why she's so worried if she's innocent. John sees Belle for the first time sinc

While Vivian and Ivan search frantically for Laura, Laura watches Victor, realising how much he truly loves Kate. Later at Salem Place, she watches Jennifer telling a clerk how much she misses her mother. Vivian dresses as a bag lady to find Laura in disguide. Jennifer, Peter, Austin, Carrie, Billie, and Bo all end up at the Cheating Heart, where Billie spots Kate's maid, Mary, wearing the seashell shoes she remembers from the night of Curtis' murder. Carrie does not recognize Alan as her attacker. Later at Johnny Angel's, Lucas introduces Sami to his friend Alan, who notes how much she looks like Carrie.

Pat Hamilton calls Alice to the stand and forces her to admit that the scrap of dress they found belongs to Billie. Bo is successful in getting Kate put on the stand, but she denies her connection to Curtis. Marlena clears Belle's things out of Roman's house. Roman goes to take her Belle's favorite toy, and is devastated to see John there. Stefano narrowly escapes Kristen and Tony seeing him, but comes face to face with Tony upon leaving the secret room.

As the shocked Hortons see that Laura is alive and well, Mickey again asks Kate about her connection to Curtis. When she says there is none, Laura reveals that Kate was married to him! Stefano begs Tony not to tell Kristen he's alive, and Tony reluctantly agrees after Stefano reminds him that Kristen could easily turn against him. Marlena begs Roman not to turn his back on her and Belle, but he tells her that Belle only needs one father in her life, and it's not him.

Kate reiterates that Curtis Brown stole her children to punish her because he knew how much they meant to her. Jennifer is thrilled to think that Billie and Austin may have found their mother, but Billie is more worried about Bo learning Curtis molested her. Stefano rings John and plays the Chopin tune that is to unlock John's most deeply buried memories. John and Marlena rush to the docks (thanks to sounds on the tape), but Stefano is nowhere to be found. Laura is officially introduced to her granddaughter Abby. Jennifer is thrilled that Mike and Bill are coming home, but Laura doesn't want to see her ex-husband.

Alice points Lucas out to Laura, and she can't help but stare at the boy. When Alice comments that Lucas does look familiar, Laura says nothing. She heads over to talk to Lucas, introducing herself, and commenting that he doesn't look like his mother. Lucas agrees; apparently it's his father that he takes after. Carrie and Marlena both tell Sami and Alan that Alan is too old for Sami, and Sami tells them both to stay out of her life. Marlena has papers for Roman to sign giving up his claim to Belle, and Roman gets angry all over again as he relives what Marlena and John's affair did to him. When Billie tries to find out more information about Kate's children to ascertain if she is there mother, Kate rips down one side of her and up the other, telling her that it's no wonder her mother left her. A devasted Billie tells Austin that there is no way Kate is there mother.

Lucas takes the blame for killing Curtis, and is able to give a detailed description of exactly what happened that night. As Bo leads Lucas away in handcuffs, the judge declares a mistrial. While Mickey warns Billie that a mistrial means she could be tried again, Kate rails at Billie, telling her this is all her fault. Marlena is backed up by Roman, who also agrees that Alan is too old. He doesn't want Sami seeing anyone over eighteen years of age. Sami rages at her mother, telling her she ruins everything, then calls Alan to tell him they're still on, but he says he doesn't want to cause problems in her family.

At Billie and Carrie's apartment, they have a combination birthday party for Carrie and surprise party for Billie. Austin and Carrie decide to give their 'special weekend' another try. Roman stops by to wish his daughter a happy 20th, and tries to convince Sami to ease up on her mother. Kristen is happy to be moving into Stefano's house with Tony. Together with Peter and Jennifer they celebrate a housewarming. Jennifer takes Kristen aside for a talk, but never gets to what she wanted to say. John goes to see Belle, and he and Marlena two have dinner, with Marlena lamenting the distance that has grown between her and Sami.

At the party Laura comes close to having second thoughts about Kate when she learns how supporting she was during Abby's sickness, but Vivian reminds her that Kate cost her a great deal. Austin also wants to talk to Kate, to find out what she remembers about the genders of Kate's two children. Sami convinces Jamie to lie that she will be spending the night at her place, and makes plans to meet Alan, knowing her parents disapprove.

After hearing the music Stefano programmed into him at the party John leaves, then meets a man named Gabe on a park. He can't understand how Gabe can know his name, but Gabe is gone before John can ask. He arrives home to find an envelope containing a puzzle piece, which he realises must be connected to Stefano. The apparition of Curtis tells Billie that she's forgetting something about that night. She and Bo go back to the boathouse, but every time Billie tries to make love to Bo she closes her eyes and sees Curtis' face. Alan lays the charm on thick for Sami, making it seem like she's important to him. He decides that if he can't have Carrie, he can most definitely have Carrie's sister. Bill is thrilled that he and Laura are back together, not realising that Laura hasn't let go of her hatred for him.

Roman agrees to irreconcilable differences as the reason for their divorce. After telling him he could still be part of Belle's life, Marlena is believing that she may be making headway with Roman when John calls. After hearing John's voice on the answering machine, Roman can't forget how they betrayed him, and heads out. Bill is shocked when he realises from what Jennifer has said that Kate Roberts is the Kate is knew long ago, and that Laura knows all about it. Meanwhile, Laura agrees to keep quiet for Jennifer's sake, but tells Kate she relishes her (Kate's) pain. Billie is unable to make love to Billie because she can't separate him and Curtis in her mind. Bo doesn't understand why she can't be with him if he can forgive her for the drugs.

At Lucas' trial, Billie suddenly remembers that neither Lucas nor Kate killed him. She declares Lucas' innocence, which backfires, because Pat Hamilton decides to re-try Billie. Bill begs Laura for another chance, but she says she can't forgive him for 18 lost years, and shocks him with the news that Lucas is his son.

After Carrie catches Alan and Sami together in the park, Alan suggests the two of them sit down and talk. Only when they do, he doesn't seem to want to talk about Sami...all they talk about is Carrie and Austin. Lexie keeps trying to tell Abe that she's going to go to medical school instead of re-join the force, but they keep getting interrupted. Just as she is about to tell him, he finds out from the chief of police. Bo tries to convinced Billie to let Marlena put her into a hypnotic trance, but Billie refuses. She doesn't want him to learn her other secrets. After he walks out, she agrees, to keep him happy. Mickey is representing Roman in the divorce. When he learns Marlena hasn't retained a lawyer, he heads over to talk to her. The two finally connect, and he makes her understand it's over.

Billie agrees to go under hypnosis, and on the stand, Marlena questions her about the night that Curtis died. While hypno-Billie admits to knowing him, she doesn't say how. Marlena brings her out of it, and with Pat Hamilton badgering her, Billie screams out the truth...Curtis Brown was her father!

On the stand, Billie tells all about her life with Curtis...the molestation, the pornography, drugs. Marlena realises that this means Kate could be Austin and Billie's mother, but she can't reach Kate.

Billie begs the court not to blame Austin, Bo, or Carrie for Curtis' murder, saying they didn't know she had killed him. Marlena tries to convince Roman that Billie may be innocent after all, then begs him for another chance. Peter tries to get Stefano's attention, telling him that he'd better get down to the hospital.
Billie initially refuses to believe Kate is her mother, then when the two are left alone, she spits out everything Curtis did to her, and blames it all on Kate.

Billie refuses to accept Kate as her mother, and is devastated that she and Bo are not allowed to see each other. Austin does his best to reassure his sister. Alan tries to convince Lucas to help him break up Carrie and Austin, but Lucas is more interesting in arguing with Carrie about Billie and Austin. Kate nearly hits Bill with her car, and the two talk about their past. She hopes to one day tell Lucas the truth, but says not now.

Lucas continues to believe that Austin and Billie are after Kate's money, prompting another battle between him and Austin. John and Bo trick Fred Harris into admitting he knows more about the murder than he says.

Tony begs Peter to help Billie, but there is nothing that he can do. Although the judge does allow Billie's friends to testify, he tells them that nothing they say will sway his opinion. Laura is considering giving Bill another chance, but when she sees Kate's lipstick on his handkerchief, it's over for good.

On the stand, Billie finally remembers what happened the night that Curtis died. As Peter and Kristen listen in dawning horror, Billie reveals that it was Stefano's voice she heard arguing with Curtis. The two struggled, and Curtis was shot accidentally. Laura tells Bill everything she knew about him and Kate. Their affair, Kate's pregnancy, everything. Bill tries to convince Laura that he had broken up with her, but she tells him that it doesn't matter. Sami is thrilled to show Austin her fake I.D., because now she will be able to get into the fraternity parties with him.

John takes advantage of Kristen's confusion to try to convince her that Stefano is still alive. Kristen remains convinced that Stefano would never have let Billie take the fall for something he did. They go to the jail to talk to disgraced police officer Fred Harris, only to learn he's hung himself. Sami is surprised and hurt to hear Carrie calling Alan to invite him to the surprise party, and Alan saying yes. Later he explains he did it so not to look suspicious. All charges against Billie have been dropped, and she and Bo head out to celebrate. Vivian tries to seduce Jamie's dad so Ivan can get the dirt on Kate.
Billie and Bo decide to give their relationship another shot. Tony and Kristen leave Salem and head to Aremid. Ivan steals Caldwell's audiotapes.

Kate offers Austin a column in Bella magazine, but he refuses to do it unless Billie gets Countess Wilhelmina back. He says it's always been the two of them, and he won't turn on her that way. Sami threatens to have herself legally emancipated if Marlena continues to tell her what to do. Marlena's therapist tries to refer an obsessive patient (Alan) to her. Lexie goes to see Jonah to get some tips on her medical school interview, and finds Wendy there, and Jonah in bed. Jealous, she leaves.

Alan's therapist tries to get Alan to go to Marlena, but when he spots her, he takes off. Later, Marlena and Roman visit the lawyers to divide up their property. Mickey tries to convince them to give their marriage another try, but Roman refuses. Lexie tells Abe that Wendy isn't good enough for Jonah, but Abe disagrees; he quite likes the young mother. Jonah tells Lexie that he and Wendy are just friends. Ivan tells Vivian that the portion of Caldwell's tape that she didn't listen to contained all of Kate's juiciest secrets.

Jennifer breaks things off with Peter, but Kristen begs her to reconsider, because she has never seen her brother love someone this much before. Lucas goes to see Bill looking for information about his father after he realises Bill was Kate's doctor years earlier. Bo and Billie go on an '80s style date, and he tells her about Hope.

Laura initially declines Bill's invititation to the Titan party, but later changes her mind. She shows up just in time to find Bill and Kate locked in an embrace on the balcony. Vivian hands David Caldwell's tape of his private sessions with Kate over to reporter Fisher Andrews from The Intruder. Stefano is shocked when Kristen shows up at Maison Blanche.

Laura tells everyone about Kate and Bill's affair, and that Bill is Lucas's father. Fisher Andrews chimes in his two cents, revealing that Kate and Victor aren't legally married because she is still married to Curtis! Chaos erupts, with Mickey, Jennifer, and Lucas all furious with Bill for all the secrets, and Victor furious with Kate for not telling him the truth. Stefano tells Celeste to let Kristen stay at Maison Blanche, because it's nice to have her around again.

While Jennifer rails at Bill for not telling her the truth about his past with Kate, Lucas rails at his mother. Bill packs his bags and leaves the house, as Lucas heads out as well. After Lucas manages to kill Austin's car, Alan offers to help him fix it. Bo continues to try to convince Billie to go back to high-school and get her degree, but she tells him that her first high-school experience was just too painful, and she's not ready to repeat it. Marlena tells Kate she needs to fight for her relatinship with Victor, but Kate tells her that she's going to let Victor decide whether or not he ever wants to truly marry her.
Victor tells Kate he needs time to think about their relationship while at the Horton house, everyone is still angry with Bill.

In New Orleans, John finds a drugged Kristen. As he is about to get her to safety, he turns to find Stefano DiMera pointing a gun at him. Marlena and Roman both worry about John, and wonder why he didn't call the police the second he got to New Orleans. After jinxing Austin's car, Alan has a momentary attack of conscience and calls the police.

When there is trouble reported at the frat party, Abe and Roman rush to check it out. Alan, meanwhile, has decided he doesn't have a chance to rape Carrie, so it'll have to be Sami instead. Austin manages to make it up to the ski lodge so he and Carrie can begin their romantic weekend. John is about to expose Stefano to Kristen when he is knocked out.

On her first day, Billie speaks to the class about the reality about being a survivor of sexual abuse, particularly when it's a family member. Later she spots a bruise on Jamie's arm, but Jamie brushes her off. Carrie and Austin are basking in the aftermath of their love making, but the rapist continues to rear it's ugly head. Carrie talks to Sami, who doesn't tell her sister about her plans with Alan. Abe and Lexie are trying to enjoy their time together at the mall, but they can't help but worry about how Roman is handling the loss of his wife and a girl he thought was his daughter.

Kate goes to see Caroline when Victor won't decide their future and begs her to go and see her former lover. Caroline eventually goes, and finds Victor and Vivian together for lunch. At the class lunch, Billie catches a look from Jamie, and the sparks flying between Jamie and her father lead Billie to believe that David is abusing his daughter. Alan makes a show of telling Roman how he understands that he and Sami can't date and that they'll just be friends.

Billie mentions her concerns about Jamie and her father to Bo, who promises to check it out. Almost immediately she has second thoughts, and wonders if maybe she just doesn't know what kind of relationship a father and daughter should have. Bo reassures her about her instincts. Thanks to Caroline's interference, Marlena and Roman end up at the same Marx brothers movie festival, and 'win' a dinner at the Penthouse Grill. They go, but only to talk about the children.. Everyone but Alan is happy to see Carrie and Austin secure in their future.
While Bo and Billie are out to dinner they run into the Caldwells. Billie accuses David of molesting his daughter. Bo tells her she better apologize, or it's over.
While Jamie is at her father's office, he begins forcing himself on her. Neither realises Billie is coming by to talk to David, looking for backing in her new company.
John and Marlena are able to get together at Stefano's place, where they share their stories.

Marlena vows to seduce Stefano if necessary to get her and John out of there, but her plan backfires, and John and Celeste watch on closed-circuit television as the seduction becomes all too real. After hearing Bo and Billie exchange 'I love you's, Shawn Douglas wants to know when the two are getting married. Peter believes he and Jennifer are back together, and kisses her.

At Maison Blanche, the mysterious woman begs Celeste to help her escape after she sees a photograph of Bo. Shockingly enough, she looks exactly like Hope Brady. Ivan and Victor make their 'donations' at the clinic where Vivian and Kate's eggs are to be fertilized. Billie dreams of a wedding while Bo looks at engagement rings.

While visiting Hope's grave, Shawn Douglas and Bo run into Alice. After speaking to his former grandmother-in-law, Bo realises where his heart lies, and tells Billie that he's prepared to move on...with her. The mysterious woman at Maison Blanche takes the photograph of Bo from Marlena's suitcase, and carefully cuts out his face before placing it in a special place. Carrie hands in her resignation, refusing to work for a company that does not welcome Billie.
The news spreads through Salem that Tom Horton has passed away. Aremid's Salemnites return home for the funeral, and Mike calls Bill in Somalia.

In town for Tom's funeral, Bill is surprised to learn that Laura is taking anti-depressants, but has been hiding it from everyone. Sami is relieved when an AIDS test turns out negative, but frightened anew when the doctor suggests a pregnancy test. Billie and Kate run into each other for the hospital, where they share a rare mother-daughter moment.

John finds Kristen praying in the chapel, and she admits to him that if Stefano hadn't faked his death, she never would have blamed John, and would not have gone through with her marriage to Tony. When the medical records and dental files can't prove her identity, Bo decides to compare Hope and Gina's fingerprints. Shawn Douglas is heart-broken to learn about Tom's death from Bo.
The town of Salem gathers to mourn Tom Horton. At the chapel, Shawn Douglas sees Gina for the first time, and is shocked when she asks him if she is his mother.

After the priest says that Kristen and Tony's marriage meets the qualifier for annulment, Kristen tells John she won't sleep with either of them until Tony's sight comes back and she ends the marriage. Gina admits that she wishes she could have been Shawn Douglas' mother and Bo's wife because then she could stay in Salem and be a real Horton. Even though Vivian is okay after falling, the doctor tells her she must stay at the Kiriakis residence (to her delight). Tom's wake continues as his family mourns his passing.

Bo and Mike decide that the only way to prove who Gina really is would be to check her DNA against Shawn Douglas's. Before they can, though, Gina decides to leave Salem, and Bo has to chase after her. While Abe and Roman are questioning Leo, a drug dealer they arrested who worked in Peter Blake's nightclub, hoping to prove that Peter is dirty. Jennifer isn't sure what to do about her romance with Peter when Alice tells her how strongly she disapproves of him.

Mike finally admits to Bill that the reason he left Israel is because he inadvertantly shipped a package of weapons (thinking they were medical supplies) to a rebel faction, which resulted in the deaths of many people. Laura passes her medical recertification examinations with flying colors, meaning she can start practicing again. She feels even better to be asked out by an attractive man. John finally discovers his missing computer, but reveals he has a backup disk. Tony destroys the laptop, unaware of the disk. The Titan Health Club finally opens.
Laura calls the private investigator she hired and learns that he found Jack.

When John learns that Kristen has once again failed to tell the truth, he issues her an ultimatum...it's either him or Tony! Luckily for John, Kristen chooses him. Gina buys The Velveteen Rabbit for Shawn Douglas, which bothers Bo, because Hope once bought the same book. While meeting with Manuel in Spain, Kate realises he was Vivian's lover.

The heatwave is on-going in Salem. While Bo and Gina share a romantic interlude, Billie realises the boat is gone, but luckily manages to find Shawn Douglas, who is hiding at the pier. Jennifer and Peter share a romantic interlude at the cabin, unaware that Jack is on his way, courtesy of Alice Horton. Kate is trapped in the elevator with an agonized Vivian.

The DNA test results are due in today, but Bo and Gina have more important things on their mind. When Shawn Douglas has an accident at school, they rush to be with him. Tony votes Billie in as his representative at Countess Wilhelmina, and Carrie decides to go back to her old job.

While Celeste does her best to convince Kristen that John truly is a priest, John questions Bishop Andrews, who admits that he did have a Father John Black in the diocese, but there is no picture available. Lucas protests Billie's appointment, and when Tony, Victor, and Kate all discuss it, Kate sides with Billie, infuriating Lucas. Billie rushes to tell Bo the good news. Gina sings 'Twinkle Twinkle Little Star' to Shawn Douglas, convincing Bo of her identity.

John tries to make Kristen jealous using his date, Tanya, to the charity ballgame for the vision impaired. Caroline is disgusted by the social climbing Tanya, who admits that she plans to ship Brady off to school as soon as possible. When Brady is hurt, it's Kristen he runs to.

John tells Bo that he's really a priest, and Bo tells John that Gina is really Hope. When Shawn Douglas returns from Los Angeles, Bo tells him that Gina is really his mother, Hope, and Shawn Douglas is excited to think that he has his mother back at last. Daniel tells Peter that the fumes in Laura's office are now beyond the danger level. He wants to get them out of there right away, but Peter says there is no need. Neither knows Jennifer went to the office to look for Laura. While the police search the house, Vivian hides Laura. Although she doesn't really want to help, Vivian reluctantly agrees to help Laura prove her sanity.

When Shawn Douglas wants to know why Hope doesn't live with them, Bo decides it's time she move back in. After hearing on the radio that Bo is at a fire, Billie rushes to him to make she he's safe, and finds him unconscious. After using a phone call to brainwash Hope, Celeste calls Mike, reminding him that she has the goods on him, and he must manipulate his way into Marlena's life. Sami is surprised by a seventeenth birthday party, but she's not in the mood to celebrate.

Kristen is at the Horton Cabin meant to be looking after kids from the Horton centre, who didn't show. John rushes to see her to tell his news about being released from his vows. Tony is also on his way to the cabin to tell Kristen he can see. Stefano and Celeste discuss their schemes. Jonah starts having fantasies about Lexie. John gets to Kristen first. After Celeste tells Stefano that Tony had a gun, Stefano rushes to the ferry. His contacts have told him that Tony is there.

Billie seeks out Marlena's advice about Stefano. She tells Marlena she thinks that Stefano brainwashed Gina to think she's Hope. Stefano meets Tony at the dock and tries to persuade him from going to the cabin. Bo discusses his situation with Mike. John continues to tell Kristen he want her and not the priesthood. Stefano persuades Tony to go home.
Billie keeps pushing the brainwashing issue with Hope and Hope decides to move out.

Celeste demands from Mike, Marlena's alarm code. Jack and Laura get very friendly. Jennifer decides to visit her mother. Billie tries again to persuade Bo that Gina isn't Hope, but finally approves of Hope moving out. John and Kristen are still stuck on the island and Kristen is still adamant that she's staying with Tony. After spraining her ankle, John cradle Kristen in his arms. The closeness is too much and they start to kiss. Tony keen to see Kristen rushes to see if there is a ferry to the island. While waiting he looks through the telescope and sees John and Kristen kissing. With the alarm code, Stefano enters Marlena's apartment.

Jennifer and Peter visit Laura. She tells them about how happy she is to be at the Meadows and wants them to meet her friend. Tony agonises over what he has seen. Bo and Hope finally leave Billie. Thinking Hope is at the apartment alone, Celeste sneaks into plant another memory. Billie, after having a shower and drinking the drugged tea, she falls asleep on the couch with the towel hiding her face. Celeste begins to brainwash a memory to Billie thinking she is Hope.

Celeste relates the memory of Bo and Hope's first night in the Loft to Billie. Billie wakes from her sleep calling that she's not Hope. Celeste sees that it's Billie. Bo tries to recall their past to Hope, but she can't remember anything. When Mike escorts Marlena home, he checks her apartment, as he feels quilty for giving away her alarm code. After struggling with Celeste who ran out, Austin comes to Billie's rescue. She explains about her dream. When Celeste ran out she left behind her book of Hope memories. Billie now realised that someone thought she was Hope and she must find proof to give to Bo before he and Hope make love. As Marlena sleeps, Stefano appears from inside her closet and has a mask and cape on.

Billie finds the book of memories and now must find Bo. Stefano speaks to a sleeping Marlena and recalls the time she stripped for him at Maison Blanche. He kisses her and she awakens. He asks her to change into a beautiful white gown. She, of course, doesn't know who he is. John and Kristen are STILL on the island and Tony is seething at the dock. Celeste meets him and tries to calm his rage. Stefano take Marlena through her closet into a ballroom full of people. They dance and dance, then all of a sudden Marlena wakes in her bed. John and Kristen finally return home, Tony opens the door and pretends that he still is blind. Kristen doesn't tell him that John is there.

Billie still hasn't found Bo and tells Carries about the book of memories. Bo and Hope have taken off on the bike and due to a flat tire, camp out under the stars. They find themselves on a farm with a couple who help them on their way to the cabin. Billie finds out from Mrs Horton that Bo and Hope are headed to the cabin on the lake. Jack and Laura discuss his ex-wife and daughter and Laura's problem with intimacy. They role play being lovers and end up kissing.

Marlena wakes from her sleep feeling exhausted. She tells Mike about her dream. Laura asks Jack why he kissed her and he tells her she needed it. (They still don't know each other's name.) With help from Kate, Billie gets a lift in a helicopter to the cabin. Bo and Hope are about to make love. Jack want to see Jennifer. Laura phones Daniel and asks him out for dinner. Peter doesn't want him to go in fear that Laura will find out that Daniel works for him. While reading tarot cards, Celeste sees the "EVIL" card and tells Stefano to stope his pursuit of Marlena. Billie arrives just in the nick of time. She tells them she can prove that Gina is not Hope.

Jack and Jennifer talk on the phone, but she's not interested in seeing him. Bo and Hope can't believe that Billie has tracked them all over the place. They don't believe her. When Bo takes Billie outside to talk, she drops the book of memories. Hope picks it up and reads it.

Carrie and Austin pick up a devastated Billie from the ferry dock. Hope is torn at wether to show Bo the book of memories. Bo talks of getting on with their lives the way it was in the past. Hope says she doesn't want to live in the past and asks if he can love her for who she is. Bo evades the question. She then burns the book thinking she can't loose Bo no matter what. Kate seeks out Billie and gives her comfort. Sami asks Lucas help in breaking up Carrie and Austin as it would benefit them both.

Billie decides to leave Salem. Bo and Hope start to make love but Hope breaks away, quilt starting to take over. She tells him she's not Hope, and Billie was right all along. She pulls the book from the fire and gives it to Bo. Bo realises the truth and tells Gina that the only person who could keep him from Billie was Hope and she's not Hope. Bo rushes back to Salem so he can tell Billie he loves her. Jennifer phones Jack and tells him he can have visitation rights with Abbey but it's all over between them as she's in love with someone else. Laura gets a "Dear John" letter from Daniel, breaking their date. Jack and Laura turn to each other in their sorrow and make love. Bo and Gina find a note from Billie saying she's left town. Billie heads for the train station.

Bo finds out that Billie didn't leave by plane, so he and Gina split up, he to the train station and Gina to the bus station. Laura and Jack are uncomfortable at first, but then realise that this is their time together and are at it again. Jennifer phones her mother to wish her happy thanksgiving and Laura tells her about Daniel not turn up. Jennifer and Peter decide to visit Laura to cheer her up. They discuss if they are doing the right thing just outside Laura's door and Jack and Laura make love inside. Bo searches the train station, but to no avail as Billie boards the train. Gina tells Mrs Horton that she's not Hope, but Mrs Horton doesn't believe her.

Jennifer opens Laura's door and find Laura naked. When Jennifer realises there is someone in the shower, she thinks it's Daniel after all. When Laura tells her it's not Daniel but Clark (Jack's pretend name), Jennifer is embarrassed she barged in on her mother. Laura tells Jennifer she is very happy at the moment. Jennifer goes back to the lounge to tell Peter about Laura and her friend. Bo still hunting at the train station. He calls Billie over the PA system, but, of course, Billie doesn't hear anything. Billie reminisces about Bo. Bo has a lucky break as the trains are delayed, so he runs out to look through the train. He finally spots Billie from outside and as the train starts to pull away, Bo runs along side trying to get Billie's attention, of course, to no avail.

Celeste is on the same train as Billie to make sure she stays away from Salem. Jonah and Lexie are also on the same train going to a medical convention, not realising the other was going. Billie meets Celeste on the train and remembers her from New Orleans and then figures she was the one brainwashing Gina. Celeste denies this. Billie and Lexie meet in the walkway and Billie tells her why she's leaving Salem. Lexie tells her to go back and fight for her man, but Celeste meets Billie again as she's about to get of the train and persuades her with a tarot card reading to stay on the train. Celeste predicts much happiness for Billie. Lexie sees Celeste for the first time and think she looks familiar. While this is all happening, Bo is on his motorbike following the train to the next slow down point, where he gets on a nearby train and jumps onto Billie's train as it passes. Stefano comes out of Marlena's closet in his cape and mask for another night of dancing with Marlena.

Stefano take Marlena to the Opera. She is dressed to kill and he places a tiara and a beautiful necklace on her. John has dinner at the Penthouse Grill where Tony and Kristen show. Tony realises he can watch them without them realising he can see. Later while Tony is talking to Celeste, she hands him a piece of paper with Stefano's phone number. Kristen sees him from afar. Bo finally finds Billie, but it takes a bit of persuasion for her to come around and at the end Bo asks her to marry him.

Billie finally says "yes" to Bo and they make love on the train. Gina tells Austin and Carrie that Bo knows the truth and went to find Billie. Tony sees Kristen looking at him from a mirror. He tells Celeste to pretend she made a mistake. Both John and Kristen see Celeste and are angry that she's back in town. She claims that she has severed all ties with Stefano and is asking Tony for a job.

Bo and Billie wake on the train extremely happy. It's the day for Alan's kidnapping trial. Marlena wakes from another exhausting dream. Or was it a dream she wonders. Mrs Horton continues to comfort Gina and refuses to think of her other than Hope Brady. Marlena has feelings of evil. Tony sets up John and Kristen alone in the basement of Barron's store, to watch them together. Someone sets fire to the Salem Place Christmas tree.

Celeste intervenes in Tony scheme. As Tony watches John and Kristen from a TV in his limo, Celeste removes the antenna just as Kristen admits to John that she loves him but she's getting over it. Abe inspects the site of the fire. Carries is called to the stand.

As part of The Meadows program, Jack and Laura must spend time at "Green Mountain Ski Lodge" and try out their new skills. Peter decides to take Jennifer away for the weekend. Guess where? Carries again gets cornered on the stand by Alan's lawyer and the Judge decides not to use the tape Carrie made. Abe invites Jonah for the holidays but he say no. Jonah is now having fantasies of Lexie.

The jury comes to an impasse and the judge declares a mistrial. Alan flaunts it in front of Carrie, Sami, Austin and Jamie. Carries apologies to Sami and say she'll take all the blame. Sami slaps her. Jonah sees Lexie naked in the steam room at Titan Health Club. Sami tells Carrie she hates her. Lexie can't take Jonah's coldness towards her and asks out right if he wants her. Jonah kisses her. Lucas decides to help Sami break up Carrie and Austin.

Billie and Bo return to Salem, where Billie shares the news of their reconciliation with all her friends, and Bo breaks Shawn Douglas's heart when he has to tell him that Gina isn't Hope. Knowing the truth now, Gina decides to leave Salem. Peter and Jennifer head up to the Green Mountain Lodge for the weekend. Unfortunately, Jack's also up there, and runs into Peter at the bar.

John collects Marlena for Bo and Billies engagement party. He comments on how awful she looks. Jack gets friendly with Peter at the bar. Preparing for the party, Kristen faints and Mrs Horton asks her if she's pregnant. John overhears this. Billie convinces Gina to stay in Salem. Jack is all set to confront Jennifer, but Jennifer and Peter have left for Salem and the party. Marlena can't take anymore rejection from Sami, so she leaves the party. Stefano comes to her again.

Bo seeks Gina out and thanks her for all her help. She tells him she loves him. Stefano takes Marlena to the docks. Jennifer is edgy and sad. She tells Peter today was meant to be a special day when Jack was to give her a poem. He promised to always give her a poem on this day. Jack remembers what day it is and is determined to give her a poem. Kristen has a test and it shows negative. Jack watches Jennifer read the poem from the window. She gets angry and crumbles the paper. She tells Peter it's just another ploy by Jack and says she will marry Peter. He tells her wants her answer when she is calm and not as revenge against Jack.

Sami puts her plan into action. Lucas starts his plan as well. Gina starts her new life back at CW as a model. Bo tells Vic and Kate the good news and asks Victor if he wants to come to the wedding, but more as an alternative motive. If he gets Vic to come then Billie will ask Kate. Vic is a bit upset that that is the only reason, but accepts. Kate goes to see Billie at the boat. Billie invites Gina to the wedding.

Mrs Horton and Maggie find the Horton Centre vandalised. Sami pulls a big scam, pretending Alan or someone had attacked her. Jamie calls Austin just as Sami planned. After helping an elderly lady by reciting a prayer, John feels he should try being a priest for a little while. Father Kyle leaves John a priest collar. While looking at him Marlena becomes agitated. A party is being held at the pub for the Horton Centre children. Someone sets fire to the presents.

Both John and Marlena are without a nanny for the holidays. Mrs Horton offers Gina as a solution. Bo and Billie buy a Christmas tree. Everyone is horrified about the burnt presents. "What is happening to this town" exclaims Caroline.

Dr. Perkins tells "Clark" and "Monica" that theyvegraduated and can go home the next day. "Clark" (Jack), however, doesnt seem too optimistic and "Monica" (Laura) tries to stop him from leaving a day early. Caroline and Shawn discuss how terrible the person was to set the fire. Bo and Abe inspect the scene of the fire. Bo is surprised when he finds a set of Brady Fish Market matches. Shawn wonders what former customer it could be. Jennifer and Kristen get together with Billie for a girls night and invite Gina to join them. They have a fun time together. Billie asks them all to be her bridesmaids. Kristen tells Billie her wedding gift to her is a French designer who will make any type gown she wants. A masked Stefano takes Marlena on another nighttime journey to a golden tent, where he has two handmaidens pamper her and give her a bath. He reveals himself to Marlena, but she does not recognize him. John offers his assitance to Father Francis. Father Frances tells John he used to help him with his studies in mysticism. Both wonder why evil has hit Salem. Father Francis tells John "Why is Salem where the evil has come". Father Paul delivers some ancient scrolls to Father Francis. As soon as he opens the scrolls, the lights go out. Kristen calls him as this is happening and rushes over to the church, to find him collapsed on the floor. He warns her that Satan is in Salem. As John is leaving church, the desecrator destroys one of the statues.

Tony tells Charles he needs everything ready before Kristen returns home and will slowly tell her that he's regained his sight. Father Paul tells Kristen that the ancient scrolls may have caused Father Francis' attack. Kristen visits with Father Francis, who is now at the hospital in a stroke-like state. Kristen runs into Tony and says she thinks John can help with Father Francis' warning. Kristen then tells Dr. Bader she's not ready to start a family yet and asks her for birth control pills. Stefano is angry at Celeste with her constant reading of the tarot cards. She says she has to keep the evil spirits away. Later, Celests is aghast when she ends up with the death tarot card and realizes Satan is near. John tells Caroline that he knows good will prevail over evil. Marlena tells John about her nightmare and that the man reminded her of Stefano. John and Marlena go to church and find the statue destroyed. They call in Abe, who finds a key near the statue. Stefano watches Marlena again from inside the wardrobe. Vivan gets restless and tells Ivan that she needs to stop Kate and Victor's wedding. Kate fears that Vivian is overwhelmed by the planning. Victor hires Olga's mother, Mrs. Johannsen, to look after Vivian and make sure she eats correctly. John goes to visit Vivian to help him out with his past. He needs her to sign the petition for his removal from the priesthood as she is his only living relative in America.

Before leaving The Meadows, Jack thanks Laura for all her help and says he'll never forget her. She persuades him to believe that he and his ex-wife will get back together. Before returning to Salem, Laura reads a goodbye note from Clark, thanking her again for all she did. Jennifer, Peter and Abigail visit Santa in Salem Place. An elf asks if mom (Jennifer) and dad (Peter) want their picture taken with Abigail, and they happily agree. Alice says Jack can make Jennifer and Abigail happy, but Jennifer disagrees. Jack arrives back in Salem and watches them from afar. Later, Jack surprises Alice by eating her Christmas cookies as she arrives home, and he asks for her help. John needs Vivian to tell Bishop Andrews that he doesn't want to be a priest since she is his only living relative in the US, but wonders why she's so eager to help. Vivian confesses it's to make Victor happy, since Brady is his grandson. At Bishop Andrews office, a cardinal (Stefano) listens to John and Vivian's conversation. As Vivian and Ivan leave, the cardinal walks by and Vivian kisses his ring. She tells Ivan she recognized the ring. After John leaves, Stefano hides John's file under a stack of other files. Marlena wonders why she feels empty since the mystery man (Stefano) did not visit her in her dreams last night. Gina questions her as to what is wrong. Bo stops by and tells Gina he'll have more time soon to help her find out who she is. Gina tells Bo that Celeste could help them, but he says to stay away from her. Not listening, she tries to see Celeste, but Celeste runs away from her. A worried and upset Celeste wants to leave town but Stefano will not go until Marlena is totally his. Marlena tells Abe and Bo she's done a psychological profile on the desecrator, and is worried that more bad things could happen soon. In church, the desecrator raises a book to smash over Gina's head.

Gina follows who she thinks is Celeste into the church and ends up being knocked over the head with a book by the desecrator. When Caroline, John and Kristen go to decorate the church, they find Gina unconscious on the floor and the church spray-painted. Marlena rushes to the church because Abe called her for the psychological profile of the person doing the crimes. Caroline wonders if the desecrator could be someone they know. Lexie says Jonah's been avoiding her ever since he kissed her at the gym. Jonah doesn't want to discuss it and promises it will never happen again. Lexie says they have to get over it and act normal again around each other. Wendy shops for gifts for Benjamin's godfathers, Austin and Jonah. Maggie tells Wendy that Jonah is great with Benjamin. Mike reminisces about his loved ones and tells Mickey he has a surprise for Alice. Jack asks Alice for help in getting back Jennifer, wanting to break up Jennifer and that block of ice (Peter). He tells her Monica helped bring out feelings in him he's never had before. Jack disappears when Jennifer and Laura drop by. Everyone gathers at Salem Place for the second lighting of the Christmas tree. Jack has dressed up as Santa to get closer to Abigail. Abe tells his officer on duty, Detective Adams, that the password is Santa and the desecrator overhears. The desecrator gets him to leave and opens the Christmas tree fuse box.

Alice is happy with the new tree being dedicated to Tom. She says it's her first time in 50 years not decorating a tree with him. Jonah says Tom helped him become a doctor. Maggie says Jennifer is close to accepting Peter's proposal, as Alice tells her that Jack is back. A surprise guest returns for the tree lighting: Julie Williams. Julie says she and Doug had hoped Gina was Hope, but is disappointed she's not. John tells Kristen no one will burn down this tree. The desecrator goes near the fuse box with pliers. Mickey and Alice dedicate the tree in Tom's memory. As Alice tries to light the tree, the fuse box smokes. John and Abe go to investigate A man, Gabe, stops by and tells John to hook the Christmas tree plug into the TV crew's generator. Shawn-Douglas suggests that Gabe is an angel. Once the tree successfully lights, Julie starts the crowd singing O Come All Ye Faithful. The carolers also sing Angels We Have Heard on High and Joy to the World. Shawn tries to comfort an upset and alone Sami. Jamie asks Sami to try to let her anger against Carrie go. Two young men spot Sami and make fun of her when they recognize her from the Intruder rape story. Marlena tells Shawn and Caroline she's worried about Sami's anger towards Carrie. Austin asks Carrie to break the tension and start over tonight. Austin asks what's up with Jonah. He mentions it has to do with the married woman he told him about. Laura calls Dr. Perkins and tells her to tell Clark that she hopes he's back with his ex-wife. Laura tells Maggie she misses Clark a lot. Jack, dressed as Santa, gets to hold Abigail. An unknowing Jennifer invites him to come to the hospital to give out presents. John realizes his church keys have been stolen and head over to the church. He finds the desecrator there ready to ruin the statues with a hammer and they fight.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michael C. Russo|Ashaneese and Nasharin Holderness|Margie Ray|Michael Philip|
Episode.Overview: Celeste fears with Stefano interfering in Marlena's dreams has caused something evil to enter Salem. John fights the person in black but they are too strong and rush out as Abe and Kristen arrive at the church. John has grease paint on his hands. The person in black had covered their face commando style. Then we see gloved hands removing grease paint from their face. They remove their cap to show blonde hair and then we see the persons face. It's MARLENA!!!!!!! Everyone pitches in to help clean the church for midnight mass. John finds the hammer Marlena dropped. The hammer has initials SB on it, and John recalls that it belongs to Shawn Brady. They figure the person doing all the damage is someone close to the Brady's. Mike tells the Christmas story at the hospital. John and Kristen go over to see Marlena to get her psychological profile. She was asleep and is shocked to learn of the desecrations. John and Kristen are worried about Marlena, she looks terrible and nearly faints. They get a doctor to look at her. They leave a sleeping Marlena. She is jolted awake as her bed starts jumping up and down. The Hortons start their Christmas ritual of putting the ornaments on the tree. John gives Midnight Mass. Marlena screams for John as her bed stops. Once she has fallen asleep again, she levitates above her bed.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michael C. Russo|Joanna Wexler|Diane Delano|Charles C. Welch|Matthew Ryan|
Episode.Overview: Presents are being opened at the DiMera's, Kiriakis and the Hortons. Bo asks Billie to give her mother a gift by inviting her to their wedding. Gina is with John and the kids. Marlena dreams of all that she has done to Salem. She wakes feeling very cold. Billie and Bo meet Vic and Kate in the park. Billie invites Kate to her wedding. Marlena gets back in bed and the bed starts moving again. Mrs Horton asks Gina over for dinner and gives Gina an ornament with her name on it to put on the tree. John goes to check on Marlena but she doesn't answer the door. She's too busy levitating above her bed. Vic asks Bo to be godfather to his son. Marlena wakes and as she gets out of bed her bedroom door slams shut. As she approaches the door, her chest of drawers moves towards her.

The girls are trying on their bridesmaids dresses. Kristen has called a designer to make Billie's dress. Billie has no place to have her reception. John goes over to check on Marlena. He has a key and lets himself in. He has to force himself into her room and finds her still asleep and very cold. Vic and Kate decide to postpone their wedding so that Bo and Billie can have the Penthouse Grill for their reception. It's a gift for them. John is shocked to see Marlena's condition and calls an ambulance to take her to hospital.

Marlena tells John that someone tried to attack her but she didn't know who it was. She remembers seeing someone with red eyes and a terrible laugh. When John and Mike don't believe here when she tells them he was a monster, she becomes hysterical. John and Mike try to calm her but she fights them both. Mike gives her a sedative to put her to sleep. As John and Mike discuss Marlena they find her standing there next to them. Mike is astounded that she is awake. She demands to go home. John takes her home and helps her into bed. As John leaves Marlena turns around and has green eyes and says to John's retreating back, "you won't win" in a very evil voice.

The day of Billie's bridal shower. John comes back with tea for Marlena and she's in "devil" mode (green eyes). She picks up a pair of scissors. Alice gives Lucas a belated gift, a Christmas ornament with his name on it. Kristen sees her doctor for a prescription for the pill. Marlena comes to and wonders why she's holding scissors. John leaves again as Marlena sleeps. A shadow appears in her room and she awakes "devil" mode saying "Yes I hear you and I will find the traitor." We see the shadow who has red eyes. Marlena, dressed in her desecrator outfit, is at the church. She is being told what to do and looks up to the hanging chandelier above. She loosens the nuts on the bolts. John arrives at the church, sees some rubble on the floor and looks up to the chandelier.

The day of Bo and Billie's wedding, Marlena is woken by John. She finds in her hands two bolt nuts. Alice must let go of wishing that Gina is Hope. Everyone is getting ready for the wedding. Father Francis is still in hospital unable to speak. Peculiar things are happing to him. The shadow with the red eyes appears in his room. Lexie rushes into his room when she heard glass breaking. Father Francis's eyes have turned green and he attacks Lexie. The wedding starts with Marlena standing at the back "devil" eyes. She looks up to the chandelier as they sway. Maggie takes Abby for a walk on the pier, where they run into Jack. He introduces himself to her for the first time, telling her he's her daddy. She yells, "Daddy," and breaks Jack's heart when he realizes she's calling out to Peter.

Today is the day that Billie and Bo have been waiting for. Their wedding begins with Jennifer, Carrie, Gina, and Kristen (the bridesmaids) headed up the aisle, followed by Austin, who is giving Billie away. All of a sudden, the chandelier (courtesy of Possessed Marlena) drops, narrowly missing Billie. Bo is willing to postpone the ceremony if she is too upset to go on, but Billie still wants to get married. Just as the wedding is continuing to go ahead as scheduled, Alice Horton speaks up...and says the wedding cannot go on! At the hospital, Jonah rescues Lexie from Father Francis' attack.

Everyone at the Church is shocked when Alice announces that she cannot let Bo and Billie get married. When questioned by Father Jansen, she states that she knows in her heart that Gina is really Hope, and that Bo cannot marry Billie while his first wife is still alive. Jack and Jennifer run into each other outside the Church, and he swears he's come back for her. On his knees, he begs her for another chance.

Bo and Billie beg Father Jansen to perform the ceremony, but he refuses, saying that he can't in good conscience marry two people while one of them may still be married. While Austin confronts Gina about her role in the stopped wedding, John offers to help Bo prove that Gina isn't Hope.

Billie wake up from a bad dream but Bo is there to comfort her. Jack brings Jennifer a large bouquet of yellow roses. Marlena finds a bolt nut on her floor as John finds another in the church. Marlena goes tot he church with John, but is very uneasy with being there. Peter and Jennifer organise a party for Bo and Billie. Jack tries to convince Jennifer that he has changed. Marlena tells Caroline of her uneasiness. Caroline suggests she light a candle which Marlena does but it blows out. Marlena goes to the hospital and enters Father Francis's room. He tells her he know who she is. Marlena says he doesn't even know her. He say "not you, him, the devil". The devil reveals himself to Father Francis (Marlena's eyes are green and her voice distorted). Devil laughs as he tells Father Francis that he won't be telling anyone who he is. Father Francis say "Good will over come Evil". Marlena tries to suffocate Father Francis with a pillow.

Bo and Billie ask Mickey to speak to the Bishop, but he agrees with Father Jansen's decision. Kristen finds Gina in the church. Gina tells her she love Bo and there's nothing anyone can do about it. Kristen is upset because it was all her father's doing. John enters Father Francis's room as Marlena pulls the pillow away. She comes out of it and Father Francis falls into a coma. She has a plausible excuse why she is in his room. Later Marlena wonders as to why she was in Father Francis's room. Tony arrives at the Deveraux house to talk to Peter, but ends up visiting with Abby instead. Jack gets himself invited to Bo and Billie's party by Peter, who doesn't even know who he is. As everyone gathers at Jennifer's place. Peter goes to introduce Jack as his friend "JD". Jennifer is furious that Jack dared come to her house. Jennifer tells him to leave and if he wants to do any talking, then talk to her lawyer. Mickey suggests to Bo and Billie declare Hope legally dead, that way they can get married. Billie is desperate to get married and suggest to Bo to go to Las Vegas.

Jack asks Mickey to represent him. Bo says to Billie that if they go off to Las Vegas, she will regret it eventually. Gina leaves the party disheartened at all the pain she's caused Bo and Billie. She mopes around the apartment and tries on Billie's wedding veil. Billie walks in and asks her what she thinks she's doing. Gina apologises, but Billie tells Gina she's had enough and wishes Gina had never showed up. Later she apologises for blowing up at Gina. Gina asks if she can do anything for them. Billie asks Gina not to stop the petition for Hope's death certificate.

Just as Carrie and Austin start a romantic evening, Sami calls because she scared and thinks someone is following her and it could be Alan, but as usual it's one of her plans. Austin to the rescue. Alan is up to something and buys a gun. Lex, Abe, Jonah and Wendy enjoy a family dinner. Carrie starts to put two and two together when it seems that whenever her and Austin have a special night planned, Sami always cries "Help". She speaks to Jamie and tells her about Sami's latest call and that Alan maybe following her. Jamie says it couldn't be because she just saw Alan outside the Brady Pub. Later Austin returns Sami to the pub. When he goes back to Carrie, she tells him of her suspicions. He thinks it's a stupid idea.

Bo plans a honeymoon for Billie. Marlena possessed decides she has to get "that priest" John of her back and make people loose faith in the church. Sami has another plan for Austin to get him tonight. Gabriel visits John. He tells him that John has a big battle ahead and that someone is going to need his strength and help. Kristen goes to St Lukes to pray. She is having so many doubts about Tony that she feels a baby right now would be a mistake.

Kristen is praying at St Lukes. Possessed Marlena grabs her from behind and chloroforms her. Sami calls Austin again but Carrie answers the phone. Carrie doesn't believe Sami's cry for help. Marlena lays Kristen in front of the alter and strips her naked. Austin returns but Carrie doesn't tell him Sami phone. Alan watches as Sami does her plotting. After another call from Sami, Austin is furious at Carrie for not telling him about Sami's first call. Alan pulls out a gun and scares Sami. Marlena paints a pentagram on Kristen's back and has her hand cuffed to the alter. Tony tells Stefano about Kristen taking the pill. He forces himself on her. John finds Kristen. Bo and Billie enjoy some skiing. Marlena goes to see Tony and lets slip where Kristen is. John takes off his coat and shirt to wipe off the pain on Kristen's back. He hugs her to comfort her and Stefano sees this from the window and gets the wrong impression. Sami struggles with Alan and gets the gun. He taunts her and she shoots him.

Stefano is devastated that Kristen and John would make love in a church. Austin, Carrie rush to the docks and hear a gun shot. They find Alan bleeding on the ground. Sami shot him in the groin. Sami confesses to Abe about shooting Alan in self defence. John continues to comfort Kristen. Stefano dissuades Tony from entering the church. Possessed Marlena watches from the bushes. John wants Kristen to see a doctor in case she was raped and is pregnant. But Kristen tells him that she can't be pregnant because she's on the pill. Bo and Billie decide to pledge their love to each other. Out in a winter wonderland. They recite their wedding vows to each other. Carrie is feeling very guilty about Sami shooting Alan.

Austin takes Sami home with him. Carrie has a nightmare that she is going to loose Austin. Jack admits to Jennifer that leaving her and Abby was the biggest mistake of his life. Alice gives Mike Tom's old pocket watch. Jennifer brings Abby down to see Jack, but she doesn't want anything to do with him.

Vivian sets up a rehearsal for the wedding, but has it all planned that she will actually marry Victor. As Kate is out of town, she will take Kate's place. She has Victor sign a marriage certificate. Kate returns from her business trip. Sami overhears Austin and Carrie talking about her and their problems. Alan tells Lucas as soon as he is released from the hospital he is seeking revenge on Sami and Carrie. He will never be able to be with another woman. Just as Carrie and Austin sort through their problems, Sami rips them apart again.

Kate returns to the house as the rehearsal ceremony commences. Austin tells Jennifer he's quitting the studio for a while as he needs to take care of Sami and spend more time with Carrie. Ivan stops Kate from disrupting the wedding. The ceremony is over and unbeknown to Victor, him and Vivian are really married. Stefano seeks Peter's help. Vivian has organised a photographer and video camera for the rehearsal, as well as cutting the cake, throwing the garter and flowers. Jack ask Kate to help him get a job at the TV station. Peter tells Stefano he won't help him. Jack gets Austin's job at the TV station opposite Jennifer.

Peter tells Stefano that he loves Jennifer and will be good for her. Marlena makes an appointment to see Laura. Jennifer is furious at Jack for getting a job at the TV station. Stefano blackmails Peter with the knowledge of putting toxic fumes in Laura's office. Marlena tells Laura about her memory lapses. Alan phones Carrie to tell her what really happened when Sami shot him. Laura wants to hospitalise Marlena but the devil take over Marlena and says she's fine and leave. Marlena arrives home and transforms into Kristen. She leaves a message on Tony's answering machine, "If you want to know what your wife is up to, go the loft." Marlena/Kristen goes to John's loft and when John closes the door, she removes her coat and has sexy lingerie underneath.

Alan tells Carrie everything he knows about what Sami is up too, re taking Austin from Carrie. Kristen/Marlena tries to seduce John, who is dressed in his priest gear. The real Kristen is having car trouble. Tony hears the message on his machine and rushes to the loft. John fights his attraction to Kristen. She tries to remove his priest's collar. Tony finally sees them together and they realise he can see. Kristen gets car assistance from an unexpected source - Gabriel. When she later phones the Auto company, they have no record of a repair truck being sent out. Carrie rushes over to confront Sami with the facts that Alan gave her. She gets angry and slaps Sami as Austin walks in. When Tony later confronts Kristen at home, she is astonished that Tony can see. He asks her what she has to say for herself. John arrives but she swears she was nowhere near the loft. Kristen/Marlena transforms back to Marlena. Later Marlena wakes from a sleep, takes one look at herself and faints.

Kristen tells John and Tony about her evening. Tony wants to check the Auto Company but she tells them they don't have a record. Gina has to sign a document swearing she's not Hope. Marlena turns up at the Di Mera mansion. After Kristen continues to plead her innocence, John thinks maybe the chloroform from the previous night could have affected her memory. Bo and Billie don't want Gina to sign the document, but Gina wants to for them.

Jen continues to be upset working with Jack. She threatens to quit the show to avoid working with him. Peter helps Jenn change all of the locks on the house to prevent Jack from coming over. Laura continues to remember her brief affair with Clark and narrowly misses seeing Jack at the house. Jack tells Jen he wants joint custody of Abby.
Sami tells Jamie how Carrie slapped her in front of Austin and how he refused to believe Carrie's accusations. Jamie & Lucas both tell Sami to give up her plan and to stop hurting Carrie but she won't listen.
Austin seeks Kate's advice on his relationship with Carrie. Vivian watches her wedding video and it is almost seen by Kate. Olga almost tells Kate about the wedding but some quick explaining by Viv and Ivan ( who is home after his appendix removal) make sure Kate does not find out.

Tony tells Stefano and Celeste that Kristen knows he can see. He tells them about Kristen and John. Jack and Jennifer argue over custody for Abby. Peter takes Abby to lunch at the Brady Pub, where they run into Kristen and talk about Tony and Stefano. Peter and Abby then walk on the pier, where Peter meets up with Celeste, who tells him he belongs in a meeting with Stefano immediately. Peter hands Abby over to Laura to babysit. Laura takes Abby to the studio to meet up with Jenn, but she's already left. A panicked Jennifer calls the studio, afraid Laura and Abby will run into Jack there. She demands that they come home immediately.
John asks Laura to visit Marlena. Marlena tells her about nightmare of Kristen. Stefano visits a sleeping Marlena. As Stefano caresses her, she wakes possessed and starts to strangle him.

Court proceedings commence to certify that Hope is legally dead. Bo recalls how Hope died. Marlena continues to strangle Stefano with Celeste on the other side of the closet, trying to get in the room. The Devil is stopping her. Celeste finally falls into the room and try's to get Stefano away from Marlena but Marlena is too strong. Celeste yells out "Dear God please help me" which make Marlena let go of Stefano. Gina is not at the court to testify. Alice gets on the stand and tells how she believes Gina is Hope. Alice later goes to find Gina at Hope's grave. Stefano and Celeste leave as they hear someone at the door. John and Kristen find Marlena totally out and calls an ambulance. She later wakes in the hospital. Gina finally shows up at the courtroom and testifies that she's not Hope. The court declares Hope dead. As Kristen visit's Father Francis, the devil is in the room.

Sami has on sexy lingerie to entice Austin. Mike does tests on Marlena as she has anaemia. Kristen rushes out of the room and tells John the lights went out, the room turned icy cold. In addition, there was a foul smell. It was as though there was an evil presence in the room. Later Marlena needs a blood transfusion. Stefano make his way into her room and writes on her chart "eyes sometime appear yellow". Carrie rushes to tell Sami and Austin about Marlena. Sami thinks Marlena is faking it. The transfusion doesn't work and Marlena's red blood cell count is very low. Sami goes in to see her mother, thinking this will earn her more points with Austin. As the nurse leaves, Marlena says "hypocrite". Sami rushes out of the room.

Austin feels very awkward as Sami parades around in her lingerie. Lucas loosens Alan's tongue with booze and records his confession of raping Sami. Sami continues to throw herself at Austin but he tells her despite his problems with Carrie, he still loves her and can only be friends with Sami. Sami grabs her coat and rushes out. She head for the Cheatin' Heart where some men try to hit on her. After hearing Alan's confession on tape, Austin knows this will clear Sami's name, but he and Carrie continue to argue of Sami and her trying to break them up. They finally decide to end it.

Lucas rescues Sami from the Cheatin' Heart and takes her back to Titian. He tells her about the tape and she's touched that he cares about her. They kiss and then make love. Carrie leaves a note on her door for Billie and Gina, saying that she'll be at Titian, but gets a call from John to go to the hospital as Marlena has had a bad turn. Austin decides he needs to talk to Carrie and sees her note, so he heads off to Titian. He finds Sami and Lucas together and thinks its Carrie making love to Lucas. He is devastated. Lucas rushes out and Sami realises that Austin thinks she was Carrie. Marlena comes too and is feeling much better. Mike is amazed at her recovery. Vivian goes into labour.

Vivian's labour is a false alarm, but she's in hospital. Jennifer goes in search of "Clark" for her mother, which leads her on a plane to Chicago with an unsuspecting Jack sitting behind her. Kristen is feeling guilt ridden and after speaking with Father Francis, she finally confesses to Tony about her affair with John. John brings Marlena home and then goes to St Lukes to pray. He prays for a sign. A bright light appears behind him and there's Gabriel.

Gabriel tells John he will suffer a great disappointment and he must prepare himself or else someone John loves deeply will die. Kristen tells Tony everything about her affair with John, but despite it, all she still loves Tony. Billie tries to matchmake Mike and Gina and invites them to dinner. Kristen comes clean about the birth control pills, not knowing that Tony knew about them all along. Billie invites Carrie to dinner as well. Austin invites Sami along. Tony asks Kristen to stay, blaming John for the affair. After hearing Jack's name announced over the PA system at the hotel, Jennifer storms up to him and accuses him of following her. Due to a snowstorm, Jennifer hires a car to leave Chicago, not knowing that Jack has stowed away in the back.

Jack shows himself to Jennifer in the car. Carrie still doesn't understand why Austin is so disgusted in her. Tony and Kristen decide to renew their wedding vows at St Lukes and John is the priest on call. Tony still wants to go ahead. Possessed Marlena locks them into the church as they say their vows. She pours gasoline over the entrance and sets it alight. Tony and Kristen pledge their love to each other in front of a distraught John. Everyone realises the church is on fire. Stefano and Celeste rush to the church. As Celeste goes to call the Fire Brigade, Stefano smells gas and wonders who could have set fire to the church. He sees Marlena hidden in the bushes. Bo and Peter help John, Tony and Kristen escape the fire.

As the snowstorm rages, Jack and Jennifer's car stall.s Jack goes for help and when he returns, Jennifer is gone. She's unconscious in the snow. Jack finds her.
